1.content:
There are many ways to pull this off, so here are some options:

Option 1: Bowser (or some other villain) gives Peach a vacuum mushroom, causing her to suck up Mario and Luigi. Now the Mario Brothers have to navigate through Peach's body and possibly stop Bowser (or some other villain)

Option 2: Peach is coming down with an illness, so Mario has to shrink to microscopic size and stop the illness inside Peach's body.

Option 3: Peach wants to have some quality time with Mario, so she shrinks him and has him explore her body.

Option 4: Someone (doesn't matter who) decides to explore Peach's body while she's not aware of it.
1.title: How to start this...

choices: Someone from a third party franchise that appears in Smash Bros.
Let this be a first-person-POV experience
14.content:
Good choice.

But who's exploring Peach, exactly?
14.title: The Peach Explorer

141.content: How about Mario or Luigi? Can’t go wrong with these bros...
141.title: The Obvious Options

142.content: Who exactly will be exploring Peach on the inside?
142.title: Someone from another Nintendo franchise

1423.content: Who will explore Peach’s innards, if not Link or Kirby?
1423.title: Another Nintendo character

14233.content: Jeez, pick someone to get shrunken somehow and explore Peach’s body already!
14233.title: Someone else

143.content: How about one of these third-party characters ends up exploring Peach’s body?
143.title: Third-Party Tinies

choices: The tunnel with the heart sign
The tunnel that leads to the lungs
144.content: Princess Peach was in her castle eating a slice of strawberry cake while reading news paper. Meanwhile you were hiding in her cake, hoping she wouldn't notice your presence. Peach used her fork to scoop up a piece of cake, only this time you were in the cake piece and the fork was bringing you closer to her mouth. She chews up the piece, swallows it and resumes reading. Inside the Princess, you found yourself in a pink organic chamber with multiple tunnels, Each tunnel had sign with a different body part labeled on it like the intestines, spinal cord, brain, lungs, heart etc. Which tunnel do you enter
144.title: Let this be a first-person-POV experience

choices: Wait for Peach to stand up again
Use her heart as a trampoline ( She may feel this but it won't harm her)
1441.content: You decide to go into the Heart tunnel. As you walk through the tunnel, you hear a heartbeat and it gets louder the deeper you go. Upon arriving, you see Peach's heart in all its glory. The giant pinkish-red muscle beating at a normal pace. Peach was done reading her newspaper and went to lay down on her couch. Your world shifted as she laid down, you were now on her heart and the only way out was up. To escape, you...
1441.title: The tunnel with the heart sign

15.content:
Option 5: Similar to option 1 but during a party where Daisy, Rosalina and possibly other Nintendo characters are at as well to be sucked into Peach's body.

Option 6:During a Smash Bros match her opponents shrink and she swallows them to trap them inside her body.

Option 7: Peach becomes evil and starts with trapping the Mario Brothers inisde her before going after more victims.

Option 8: A villain invades Peach's body trying to control her.
15.title: Any other ideas?

151.content:
Peach is waiting in her castle with the Mario Brothers for the guests she has invited to arrive at her party. She has invited quite the number of guests and after a few minutes Toadsworth comes over to make an announcement.

"Your highness, I'm happy to announce that princess Daisy has arrived." He says and she arrives with some Toads guiding her and once she's in front of Peach she makes a bow. Luigi comes over to hold her hand and together they walk in.
A little bit later some Lumas come floating down followed quickly by Rosalina. "Thanks for the invite Princess Peach, after all the trouble Bowser caused us it's refreshing I can come see you without trouble." She says making a bow to Peach. All the Lumas do the same and head in as well.

Next up a portal opens and Pit walks out. He kneels in front of Peach and says. "Princess Peach, I'm here to announce that Lady Palutena has arrived for your party."
Soon Palutena comes out the portal and makes a small bow to Peach. "Glad you've invited us Peach, hopefully it will be fun." She says and they walk in.
Next up Samus walk up carrying Pikachu and Pichu on her shoulder. They all bow down as well as Samus says. "It's refreshing to be called for a party as opposed to another bounty contract. My two cute little friends will like it here as well." She says patting them before walking in.
"That were all the guests that could make it your highness." Toadsworth says as Peach and Mario head inside as well now.

At the party Pit sees Daisy with Luigi as Peach walks in and says. "I guess they truly were different princesses after all." Palutena pats his head a bit.
Rosalina chats up with the others while samus plays with the two mouse pokemon. A while later they all start talking about their adventures and such.

After an hour everyone's called to the table. Once everyone's there the toads come over to serve everyone their food. Peach gives her little speech and everyone starts eating. However suddenly Peach felt a strange pain in her belly.
That's because a villain managed to sneak a vacuum mushroom into her meal and only hers.

Mario came towards Peach to help her but suddenly she starts sucking in so much air that Mario got sucked straight into her mouth screaming his iconic "Waaaaah", getting shrunk in the process as well. The Toads all panic but instead of running away they run in circles and soon all get sucked into Peach's mouth just like Mario did.
Luigi said "Oh Mama Mia not again." as he grabs Daisy's hand trying to run away. Sadly Peach turned to them and both Luigi and Daisy scream as they both too got sucked inside Peach's mouth and down her throat. The Lumas all cuddle with Rosalina who tried flying away, but the suction was too strong and they all became another snack for Peach.

Pit grabbed onto a pillar while also grabbing Palutena's arm. "Don't worry lady Palutena, I won't let you go."
Meanwhile Samus did the same and grabbed the two Chu's who were terrified.
This almost worked but the parts of the pillars they were holding broke off. Palutena managed to use her staff to keep her and Pit from going any further in but there was nothing Samus and the two screaming little pokemon could do and were now on their trip into Peach.

Palutena kept hlding onto her staf but this time the floor gave in giving her no more support. Unable for her and Pit to do anything they hugged each other as they finally ended up inside the princess as well.

After everyone was swallowed and shrunk by the effects of the vacuum mushroom Peach ate the princess fainted.

Who shall we follow inside Peach's body? (Still open to choose where they ended up: Stomach, lungs,...)
151.title: Option 5

choices: They fight together against Peach's stomach.
Peach's digestive track becomes a new arena and who wins gets to go back out.
Peach is declared the winner and gets to keep them in her belly.
152.content:
A new Smash Bros. match was about to start. First to arrive onto the stage was Princess Peach. Next up was Toon Link followed by Villager and last but not least it was Ness.

The countdown finishes and the match starts with Villager trying to plant a tree but Ness used a PK fire on him and gets combo'd as a result. Peach meanwhile fights Toon Link both by throwing bombs and veggies at eachother often times grabbing eachother's projectile to throw at eachother as well.

To everyone's surprise however items started dropping. They expected a no items match but oh well. A lot of items got tossed to eachother hwoever they did manage to grab enough healing items to keep them from getting launched into the blastzones. However Peach soon notices a lightning bolt and grabs it causing the others to be shrunk down. Not only that but a super mushroom landed on top of Peach making her bigger.

Peach smiles noticing her advantage over the others an her belly growls giving her an idea. The boys start fleeing from her but Peach easily catches villager. Popping the little guy in her mouth and swallows sending him into her belly. Ness tries going off stage to avoid her but Peach easily reaches far enough to grab him and soon he's on his way to Peach's stomach. Toon Link however went under the stage hoping to hide but Peach eventually found him and as he tried to flee he got caught, thrown up in the air only to land inside Peach's mouth and down her throat he went.

With the boys now inside Peach's stomach how will the match proceed?
152.title: Option 6

154.content: Which villain will invade Peach?
154.title: Who will it be?

info.brief_description: A Peach giantess endo story because why not
info.description:
A brand new concept of Peach's Inside Story because some people on a forum I'm on were talking about it.

Rules for those who want to add more:

1) Female hosts ONLY. If you want male hosts, look elsewhere.
2) No hard vore, same-size vore, or having the main character get digested alive.
3) PLEASE use proper spelling and grammar!
4) Keep it down to Nintendo characters. Any third party characters must have some appearance in any Super Smash Bros. title.
5) Have fun and go nuts.

That is all, and I hope you enjoy my interactive!
